alert.note: Alert for Custer; Lincoln; Logan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Lincoln, Logan, and southwestern Custer Counties through 545 AM CDT... At 459 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Stapleton to 13 miles south of Ringgold to near Sutherland. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... North Platte, Stapleton, Sutherland, Hershey, Arnold, Callaway, Maxwell, Gandy, North Platte Airport, Keith, Logan, Etna, Milldale, Coker, O`Fallons, Tarboz Lake, Shanklin Bluff, Pleasant Hill, Hoagland and Finchville. This includes the following highways... Highway 92 between mile markers 218 and 260. Highway 97 between mile markers 1 and 14. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 159 and 191. Highway 83 between mile markers 77 and 124. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
